hero.title: Coordinated, Transparent, Accountable.
hero.subtitle: የብልጽግና ፓርቲ የኢንስፔክሽንና የሥነምግባር ኮሚሽን
hero.description: We deliver dignified services, deliberate planning, and responsible communication across education, health, and planning portfolios.
hero.subtitleText: Strong Commission for a Strong Party!
hero.mainTitle: Addis Ababa Good Governance Inspection and Ethics Commission Office

leaders.principalSpeech: We work with unwavering commitment for the people of Addis Ababa. We strive to build a community where every voice is heard, every child receives quality education, and every family feels safe and supported.

documents.title: Documents
documents.noDocumentsMessage: Please check back shortly after the administrator uploads new records.

access.requestDenied: Your access request has been denied. Please contact an administrator if you believe this is an error.
access.requestPending: The QR code was logged with IP {ip}. An administrator will review the request shortly.
access.requestApprovedMessage: Your request has been approved! You now have temporary access to view documents. This access is valid for up to two hours.
